summary: A new races add-on to Wyldsong\'s Noiral. Still WIP
descriptionHtml:
NO LONGER ACTIVE ON THIS MOD. 
Sorry, I lost all the files for this and deiced to start my own new race. All my effort is for the new one. I might come back to this if people ask enough and I finish my new one. Sorry and thank you.


This is my first mod ever, so please keep that in consideration and this is still a work in progress, thank you. Read Issues section for known problems.The mod will now overwrite, Wyldsong\'s, BUT you will be able to play as all elements and normal Noiral. And please post a comment. Your feedback would be nice. You MUST have Wyldsong\'s The Noiral VERSION 1.5+ for this to work. I am going to add more screens/art on this page. MALE ICE NOIRALS ADDED! 

New optional with lower health regen for those who thought it was a bit too fast. Just download the main 0.9b then the optional. When installing do NOT hit upgrade, say yes to overwriting. Only works with 0.9b.

This is an add-on race for Wyldsong\'s Noiral called the Element Noirals, as of now it is only UNP. This mod aims to add specific magic type versions of Wyldsong\'s Noiral. A link can be found in the required files section just about download button.

[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/91194398@N08/8289175250/][img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8205/8289175250_b29b0f9046_c.jpg[/img][/url]


The Noiral are a race of Nords that fallow the teachings of Thadgeir the Tattooed hero of the Atmoran Civil war, and one of Ysgramor\'s five hungered companions. In the manuscripts of Thadgeir held secrets of great power and only the select few who mastered the rituals and sequestered themselves in the wilds, were granted the knowledge. Few of the Noirals learned to wield the true fires of the primal flame, the harsh bite of the primal frost and thus was branded with special symbols thought to increase ties between the body and the flame, frost.

For more lore on the Noirals, visit Wyldsong\'s original Noiral.

[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/91194398@N08/8288115731/][img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8060/8288115731_a50ece9b0d_c.jpg[/img][/url]

The Elemental Noirals are made to be played in a tougher Skyrim. I may make a version based off of Wyldsong\'s Weakened Noiral.

The Fire Noiral:

You deal 100% more fire damage
You don\'t have Wyldsong\'s Runic Resistance but...
You have 50% fire resistance, but 50% frost weakness
Primal Flame: a new fire cloak
New red runes 

Destruction 10
Conjuration 8
Enchanting 10
Two-Handed 7
One-Handed 9
Heavy Armor 9
Light Armor 7

The Ice Noiral

You deal 100% more ice damage
You don\'t have Wyldsong\'s Runic Resistance but...
You have 50% ice resistance, but 50% fire weakness
Primal Frost: a new Primal Aura
Arctic Runes: Super frost resist but super fire weakness
Bound Ice Sword: Summon a sword of ice to fight with. Note: Still WIP - model looks bad, srry.
New blue runes

Destruction 10
Conjuration 10
Enchanting 9
Two-Handed 8
One-Handed 9
Heavy Armor 5
Light Armor 9

[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/91194398@N08/8288115459/][img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8078/8288115459_57167d9819_c.jpg[/img][/url]



Wyldsong\'s Noiral v1.5 - His esp MUST be installed first. When installing mine say YES to overwriting.

[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/91194398@N08/8289174894/][img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8080/8289174894_1f71d6b265_c.jpg[/img][/url]


Noirals are greatly hindered when a Vampire, as vampires are creatures of the frost. You lose access to some abilities and lesser stats.

Vamperic Runes: 150% stronger fire and a fire resistance of 25% but a 50% weakness to frost...(sadly not working yet)

[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/91194398@N08/8289175296/][img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8075/8289175296_aeb928b193_c.jpg[/img][/url]


The Elemental Noirals should be ready for Dawngruard but if any issues arise please post an comment.

[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/91194398@N08/8288112193/][img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8057/8288112193_b183d1541d_c.jpg[/img][/url]


This mod was created due to the work of many talented modders and with out them this mod would not have existed.

Wyldsong and the origanal Noiral
appachii and AppachiiSkyHair
Chris57 and Better Males
Krisan and Spectral Shades
dimon99 and UNP
chrisvorster and Better Male Skeletons
ning999 and The Skeleton of Female Models
expired6978 and Creating a Playable Race
TMPhoenix and RaceCompatiblity for Dawnguard

Thank you Obsidian Dawn for the awesome runes and circles!

Also those who help Wyldsong make his orignial Noiral.
           \"Arisen1 for creating the new Primal Avatar skin, Primal Dragon skin and the Primal Bear     Skin, as well as the original textures for FrostFyre and Reaver, check out some of her work: Cuter Animal Textures

mkta for allowing me the use of the Nature Spells mod as the basis for two primal spells, check out the original mod here: Nature Spells

jaredbangerter for the tutorial on creating playable monsters and making them into polymorph spells: How to play as Monsters in Skyrim

Jeremie, without whose mod I would not have figured out the scripting for the Primal Bear Form to allow for the transformation back without the beast blood ritual: Druidism Skill Tree

d_rail1602 for coming up with the Custom Races mod, which got me started on this and whose mod helped me figure what I was doing wrong after some reverse engineering=) 

As well, thanks to Obsidian Dawn for the rocking arcane designs, they really helped bring the vision of the Noiral to life!

And another big thanks to ratrace, whose insights and recommendations made v1.4 possible! Check out his work: Half Orc Race\" 
Quoted from WyldTat\'s The Noiral Special Thanks
Please don\'t forget to endorse Wyldsong\'s mod.

[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/91194398@N08/8289171972/][img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8357/8289171972_6ec94c87ae_c.jpg[/img][/url]


This mod is an edited \"copy\" of Wlydsong\'s mod so any issues with his would most likely be present in mine. Also, there is most likely issues in mine not present in his. I am sorry I am new to CK and it may take me awhile to fix issues, but I will try my hardest to product results. 

- Issue while in the race menu were only some or none of the head parts (eyes, hairs, etc) are there, to fix switch to a preset and they will all return.

- When you turn invisible your eyes disappear, you can fix this by saving and then loading.


[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/91194398@N08/8289171796/][img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8070/8289171796_5bda0e9627_c.jpg[/img][/url]

0.9b Ice Males. New Stats for both fire and ice. New ice spells/auras.(Note ice sword spell is a WIP still it works but look bad) Other things.
0.9a Now compatible with Noiral 1.5, New Ice Noiral, New Name. 
0.85 Fixed issue when turning into a vampire and eyes are now HD
0.82 Fixed missing texture path.(My bad) Thanks Seaneye for pointing it out.
0.81 Fixes typo
0.8 - fixes compatibility issues with the original Noiral.
0.7 - Fixes Males and females - error due to using two esp\'s -deleted due to new esp style
0.5a - First Alpha release -deleted due to new esp style


[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/91194398@N08/8284977137/][img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8347/8284977137_dff6b6dab3_c.jpg[/img][/url]
author: Elta1 and Wyldsong
